title: Ticket #4178: condor_reconfig access level problem
description:
Hi HTConddor developers,

I am installing htcondor for the first time and trying to get to understand its workings to quite a detailed level.

Today I noticed that despite the condor_reconfig man page saying you need ADMINISTRATOR level access to run the command I am able to run it with WRITE level access only.

The version I am noticing this in is: $CondorVersion: 8.0.5 Dec 02 2013 BuildID: 212140 $ $CondorPlatform: x86_64_RedHat6 $

Hope this information helps,

Cheers Lucien
creator: moate
